BadgeDetail.Name: Professional Profile
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated that they have a professional CV that has a clear structure with no spelling or grammatical errors.

Task.Title: Check my CV
Task.Body: Using your college email account, write a CV and send it to checkmycv@sussexdowns.ac.uk. Apply any comments or suggestions and then upload your revised CV as a document..
Task.HtmlBody:
Using your college email account, write a CV and send it to checkmycv@sussexdowns.ac.uk.

Apply any comments or suggestions and then upload your revised CV as a document..
